Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Earshot \Ear"shot`\, n. Reach of the ear; distance at which words may be heard. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
earshot n : the range within which a voice can be heard; "the children were told to stay within earshot" [syn: {earreach}, {hearing}]
